mapper.select: SELECT ST_AsMVT (tile, 'points') tiles FROM ( SELECT st_asmvtgeom (t.geom, st_makeenvelope (#{xmin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ymin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xmax,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{ymax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 4326), 4096, 0, TRUE ) AS geom FROM lzc_point t ) AS tile WHERE tile.geom IS NOT NULL;

SELECT ST_AsMVT (tile, 'polygon') tiles FROM ( SELECT st_asmvtgeom (t.geom, st_makeenvelope (#{xmin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ymin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xmax,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{ymax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 4326), 4096, 0, TRUE ) AS geom FROM lzc_polygon t ) AS tile WHERE tile.geom IS NOT NULL;
